meta.job_title: Senior Director of Robotic Process Automation

duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and align RPA strategy with business objectives and industry best practices.
Lead and mentor a team of RPA professionals, including developers, analysts, and architects.
Oversee the end-to-end UiPath automation project lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment.
Stay up-to-date with the latest RPA trends, tools, and technologies to enhance automation capabilities.
Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders across departments.
Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and success metrics to measure the impact of RPA initiatives.
Ensure RPA implementations adhere to data security, privacy, and compliance standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or a related field; MBA is a plus.
